title: White Lion (Free Full Movie) Family Drama | Animals, Africa, Safari

sources.title: White Lion (Free Full Movie) Family Drama | Animals, Africa, Safari
sources.description:
In the spirit of 'Born Free', this 2010 family drama is set in beautiful South Africa. Gisani, a young African boy, meets with Letsatsi, a white lion cub. The boy protects the baby lion and they become friends. Together, they go on an adventurous journey. 

2010
Director - Michael Swan
Cast -  Jamie Bartlett, John Kani, Thabo Malema
Rated PG

Winner of Audience Award at the Lucas - International Festival of Films for Children and Young People
Winner - Three Awards from the South African Film and Television Awards
